page.title: 03FARMING IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
Behind the Tor the land is mostly rough grass land. There is a path leading to{Burnt Hill.}Down the path there are animals in enclosed fields. {Great House Farm}owns 270 acres, 600 sheep, 50 cows and 300 pigs. That makes a total of 950 animals.
There are a few other farms including one that is called {Tor Side Farm. This is a large, white building at the foot of the Tor. The farmhouse is about 75 years old, and is built out of stone.
Poor soils, only supporting rough grazing means that most farms do not grow crops. Instead of crops, they keep sheep or cattle.
